title: MFA (Multi-Factor Authentication)
description: This document describes the risk-based MFA logic in the zero-trust control plane backend: when MFA is required, MFA challenge and OTP flow, API surface, and configuration. Device trust (identifiable, revocable, time-bound) influences whether MFA is required; see device-trust.md. The canonical proto for auth is proto/auth/auth.proto; business logic lives in internal/identity/service/authservice.go.
